DOC.brief_summary: Botulinum Toxin Treatment Post Stroke Upper Limb Spasticity .
DOC.brief_title: MeditoxinÂ® Treatment Patients With Post Stroke Upper Limb Spasticity
DOC.detailed_description: This study `` A Multicenter , Prospective , Randomized , Evaluator Blinded , Comparing Phase 4 Study Evaluate Impact Injection Techniques Effectiveness Botulinum Toxin Treatment Post Stroke Upper Limb Spasticity '' .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female subject age 20 . 2 . Subjects grade 1 + spasticity least one upper limb muscle measure Modified Ashworth Scale stroke . 3 . Subjects diagnose stroke least 1 month prior study participation . 4 . Subjects legal representative voluntarily decide participation study sign informed consent . 1 . Subjects spinal injury factor spasticity except stroke prior study enrollment . 2 . Subjects allergy hypersensitivity Botulinum Toxin . 3 . Subjects change muscle relaxant take treatment within past 4 week prior study participation . 4 . Subjects take injection treatment use alcohol phenol upper limb within past 6 month prior study participation . 5 . Subjects general neuromuscular synaptic disorder ( e.g . Myasthenia gravis , LambertEaton syndrome , Amyotrophic lateral sclerosis ) . 6 . Subjects inject botulinum toxin within past 3 month injection . 7 . Subjects pregnant lactate disagreed avoid pregnancy 3 month study period . 8 . Subjects schedule take part clinical trial study period . 9 . Patients eligible study medical discretion investigator .
